Warnings.StartDateGTEndDate: You have selected a start date that was greater than the end date. The start date has been changed to the latest possible date before the end date: {date}.
Warnings.EndDateLTStartDate: You have selected an end date that was less than the start date. The end date has been changed to the earliest possible date after the start date: {date}.
Warnings.StartDateInvalid: The start date is not in a valid Month/Day/Year format. We have reset it to the previously selected date: {date}.
Warnings.EndDateInvalid: The end date is not in a valid Month/Day/Year format. We have reset it to the previously selected date: {date}.
